product_name: The North Face Honeylee Full Zip Hoodie - Women's
long_description: Woven with a comfortable blend of soft cotton and lightweight polyester fleece, the Honeylee hoodie helps you stay warm and cozy on casual fall outings and trips to the yoga studio or gym.
